newsitem.title: USA: Omega Financial sets 3-for-2 stock split.
newsitem.headline: Omega Financial sets 3-for-2 stock split.

text.p: Omega Financial Corp said Wednesday that it had declared a three-for-two stock split, to be issued in the form of a stock dividend.

The company said the split will be payable to shareholders of record, April 18 and will be distributed on April 30. Checks will be issued for fractional shares, based on the $40.75 per share market value of Omega common stock at the close of business on the March 25 declaration date.
The company said the stock split is part of Omega's plan to improve marketability of the corporation's stock.
Omega operates 41 Pennsylvania banking offices in Bedford, Blair, Centre, Clinton, Huntingdon, Juniata, Mifflin, and Montour counties.
